entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
